articles.author: RFE/RL's Ukrainian Service
articles.title: Ukraine Says It Thwarted Major Strike On Airfield; At Least Two Killed In Russian Attack In Kherson - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: Russia struck a public transport facility in the southern Ukrainian city of Kherson on June 23, killing at least two people as Ukraine grappled with yet another wide-scale attack involving Russian cruise missiles and Iranian-made drones.
